value: Here's how we would add a isGood property to myHome:

var myHome = {
"name": "Mannat",
"location":"Mumbai",
"Colour":"black",
"owner":"sharukh khan",
"neighbours": ["everything!"]
};


myHome.isGood= true;

console.log(myHome);

// output

// {
// name: ‘my Villa’,
// location:"Mumbai",
// Colour:"black",
// Owner:”sharukh khan”,
// neighbours: ["everything!"],
// isGood:true
// }
If you see, the new property isGood is added in the object.
Then in myHome object we are going to set a new property named isGood and we are giving value as true.
